Name: Creole Gimlet
Ingredients: 1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Falernum adds a touch of Caribbean spice to this Gimlet .
History: Created in 2009 by Gonçalo de Sousa Monteiro, Berlin, Germany.
Nutrition: One serving of Creole Gimlet contains 214 calories
